item.title: ‘This scam stuff is going to get worse’: A man approached me in my car — he had a crazy story
item.description: “I got rid of him by asking for a business card and a company name, and he bugged out.”

item.title: Gold is flying higher — a report of gold-bar tariffs is doing the trick
item.description: A report that the U.S. is considering tariffs on gold bars sent futures prices surging on Friday. Analysts weigh in on what it means for investors and...

item.title: It’s a new era of central-bank dissent with a whiff of stagflation in the air
item.description: It’s an era of unprecedented central bank dissension — and agreement is hard to find when the goals are in conflict.

item.title: ‘Billions’ in Medicare waste? Read the fine print.
item.description: Yet another investigation into federal government spending has found that “waste, fraud and abuse” is a lot less than some people say.

item.title: Trump’s order greenlights crypto in 401(k)s, so why isn’t my job on board yet?
item.description: Allowing nontraditional investments in retirement plans is just Step 1.
